title: Create ticket on specific customer messages in Telegram
author: tanaypant
readme: This is a workflow where a support channel on Telegram is being used to gather customer feedback. Depending on certain keywords in the customer's message, this workflow creates a ticket with a tag in your Freshdesk instance. The customer is then sent a message on Telegram and an item is created on [Monday.com](http://Monday.com) for tracking.
readme_zh: 这是一个利用Telegram上的支持渠道收集客户反馈的工作流程。根据客户消息中的特定关键词，该流程会在您的Freshdesk实例中创建带有标签的工单。随后，系统会通过Telegram向客户发送消息，并在[Monday.com](http://Monday.com)上创建跟踪项以便跟进。
title_zh: 在Telegram中针对特定客户消息创建工单
